snippet: Donald Young of the United States reached his first ATP semifinal in three years by beating Kevin Anderson, 3-6, 7-6 (3), 6-2, at the Citi Open in Washington.
abstract: Donald Young beats Kevin Anderson at the Citi Open in Washington, reaching his first ATP semifinal in three years; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Donald Young of the United States reached his first ATP semifinal in three years by beating Kevin Anderson, 3-6, 7-6 (3), 6-2, at the Citi Open in Washington.

headline.main: Donald Young Reaches Semifinals of Citi Open
headline.print_headline: Trial of Formula One Boss May End With Settlement
